mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.brief_name AS briefName,A.whole_name AS wholeName,A.type_name AS typeName,A.admin_id AS adminId,A.password AS password,A.logo AS logo,A.logo_pic_id AS logoPicId,A.website AS website,A.province AS province,A.city AS city,A.address AS address,A.email AS email,A.login_name AS loginName,A.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime,A.phone AS phone,A.tel AS tel,A.fax AS fax,A.qq AS qq,A.weixin AS weixin,A.weibo AS weibo,A.area AS area,A.doctor_num AS doctorNum,A.doctor_info AS doctorInfo,A.nurse_num AS nurseNum,A.nurse_info AS nurseInfo,A.admin_name AS adminName,A.indoor_pic_paths AS indoorPicPaths,A.outdoor_pic_paths AS outdoorPicPaths,A.age_between AS ageBetween,A.contact_way AS contactWay,A.medical_from AS medicalFrom,A.stock_way AS stockWay,A.is_doctor AS isDoctor,A.is_legal_person AS isLegalPerson,A.reputition AS reputition,A.patient_flow AS patientFlow,A.health_doc AS healthDoc,A.is_advertisement AS isAdvertisement,A.bed AS bed,A.hygienism_condition AS hygienismCondition,A.gps AS gps,A.coporation_attitude AS coporationAttitude,A.visit_info AS visitInfo,A.is_assign_contract AS isAssignContract,A.contract_info AS contractInfo,A.is_assign_intention AS isAssignIntention,A.have_visit_valid AS haveVisitValid,A.other_facility AS otherFacility,A.qr_code AS qrCode,A.qr_code2 AS qrCode2,A.introduction AS introduction,A.serial AS serial,A.type_id AS typeId,A.link_id AS linkId,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.main_ids AS mainIds,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.attr_num AS attrNum,A.attr_date AS attrDate,A.attr_datetime AS attrDatetime,A.sequence AS sequence,A.description AS description,A.remark AS remark,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy
LEFT JOIN dict d ON A.type_id = d.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:
